RuleSet.Name: src/schema/buff/SchemaBuffSchema.java
RuleSet.Descr: Java 21 buffer implementation of a $SchemaName$ schema.

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaBuffSchemaJava
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$.buff

RuleSet.GenRule: $switch HasDefSchema yes empty default reallyImplSchemaParseEnum$
$implBuffSchemaBuffParseEnumParse$$implBuffSchemaBuffParseEnumOrdinal$
newMap.put( "$Name$", $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$ );
newMap.put( Integer.valueOf( $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$.ordinal() ), $popto EnumDef Name$.$Name$ );
, I$reference RefSchema SchemaName$Schema

$implBuffSchemaSchemaConstructor$$implBuffSchemaGetCFTipClientHandler$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaConfigurationFileAccessors each empty empty implBuffSchemaConfigurationFileAccessors )$$implBuffSchemaAuthorizationAccessors$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaJndiNameAccessors each empty empty implBuffSchemaJndiNameAccessors )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaConnectionMethods each empty empty implBuffSchemaConnectionMethods )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaNewSchema each empty empty implBuffSchemaNewSchema )$$iterate SchemaRefs( first implBuffSchemaFileImport each empty empty implBuffSchemaFileImport )$$iterate Id16Generators( each implNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate Id32Generators( each implNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate Id64Generators( each implNextIdGen empty empty)$$iterate UuidGenerators( each implNextIdGen empty empty )$$iterate SchemaTables( each implTableMethods empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaReleasePreparedStatements$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaSchemaGetSetDbSchemaNameMethods$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaCommitControl$
protected I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Table table$TableName$;
protected I$DefSchemaName$$TableName$Factory factory$TableName$;
$implBuffSchemaTableTableAccessors$$implBuffSchemaTableFactoryAccessors$
$popto SchemaDef implBuffSchemaAuthorizationAccessors$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaFileImport$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaNewSchema$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaConnectionMethods$
$reference RefSchema implBuffSchemaConfigurationFileAccessors$
table$TableName$ = null;
factory$TableName$ = new $SchemaName$$TableName$DefaultFactory();
